languages.text: "Я тоже верю, что Император — человек, а не божество".
"I also believe that the Emperor is a man and not a god."
languages.original_text: "Я тоже верю, что Император — человек, а не божество".

traits.locale_text: "I also believe that the Emperor is a man and not a god."
"I also believe that the Emperor is a man and not a god."
"I also believe that the Emperor is a man and not a god."
"I also believe that the Emperor is a man and not a god."

languages.text: “其实我也相信帝皇是个人类，不是神明。”
languages.original_text: "I also believe that the Emperor is a man and not a god."

traits.locale_text: “其实我也相信帝皇是个人类，不是神明。”

languages.text: «Yo también creo que el Emperador es un hombre y no un dios».
languages.original_text: "I also believe that the Emperor is a man and not a god."

traits.locale_text: «Yo también creo que el Emperador es un hombre y no un dios».

languages.text: 「私も皇帝は神ではなく、人だと思っている」
languages.original_text: "I also believe that the Emperor is a man and not a god."

traits.locale_text: 「私も皇帝は神ではなく、人だと思っている」

languages.text: "Ich glaube auch, dass der Imperator ein Mensch ist, kein Gott."
languages.original_text: "I also believe that the Emperor is a man and not a god."

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube auch, dass der Imperator ein Mensch ist, kein Gott."

languages.text: « J'estime également que l'Empereur n'est qu'un homme, pas un dieu. »
languages.original_text: "I also believe that the Emperor is a man and not a god."

traits.locale_text: « J'estime également que l'Empereur n'est qu'un homme, pas un dieu. »

languages.text: "Ben de İmparator'un tanrı değil, insan olduğuna inanıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I also believe that the Emperor is a man and not a god."

traits.locale_text: "Ayrıca İmparator'un tanrı değil bir insan olduğuna inanıyorum."
